NC DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION
v.
MISSION BATTLEGROUND PARK, DST, et al. 361PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2017

*323Bruce P. Ashley, Attorney at Law, Patrick M. Kane, Attorney at Law, Kip David Nelson, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, Matthew Nis Leerberg, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, For Mission Battleground Park, DST, et al.

Hilda Burnett-Baker, Special Deputy Attorney General, Phyllis A. Turner, Assistant Attorney General, For NC Department Of Transportation.

Garth Dunklin, Attorney at Law, For James F. Collins.

Lorin J. Lapidus, Attorney at Law, G. Gray Wilson, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, For Civitas Institute.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of February 2017 by Civitas Institute for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2017."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
